# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/nonzeroInitialValue.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/nonzeroInitialValue.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sdtWithFunc.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sdtWithFunc.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/nonzeroInitialValue.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> nonzeroInitialValue.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/nonzeroInitialValue.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;sdt;bug963son;analytic")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/nonzeroInitialValue.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP nonzeroInitialValue.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/nonzeroInitialValue.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} nonzeroInitialValue.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/nonzeroInitialValue.cir.prn nonzeroInitialValue.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/nonzeroInitialValue.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED nonzeroInitialValue.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/sdtWithFunc.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> sdtWithFunc.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/sdtWithFunc.cir PROPERTY LABELS "nightly;serial;sdt;bug963son")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/sdtWithFunc.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP sdtWithFunc.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/sdtWithFunc.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} sdtWithFunc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/sdtWithFunc.cir.prn sdtWithFunc.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_963_SON/sdtWithFunc.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED sdtWithFunc.cir)
endif()
